about_the_game:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

7 Legendary Officers will be added.

▼Added Officer Graphics
Himiko/Nashime/Tsushigori/Fan Li/Xun Guan/Han Shizhong/Liang Hongyu

▼To Use
Select a scenario using "Select Scenario" from the main menu. Under "Manage Registered Officers" choose the Legendary Officers you wish to appear in the game.
After this selection, you can have them appear in the scenarios within the main game.
